scripts.build:js: rimraf dist/app-* && cp src/app.js dist/ && uglifyjs dist/app.js -o dist/app-"$APPREV".min.js --source-map dist/app-"$APPREV".min.js.map --source-map-url app-"$APPREV".min.js.map --source-map-root / -m -c --screw-ie8
scripts.inject:js: export APPREV=$(date +"%Y%m%d%H%M%S") && npm run build:js && sed -e "s/<!-- inject:js -->/app-$APPREV.min.js/" index.html > dist/index.html
scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist && mkdir -p dist && npm run move:assets
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently "lite-server dist" "npm run watch:html" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js"
